performances.description: Identify individual performances in historic playbills

tasks.question: Identify each performance
tasks.guidance: Alongside the main performance, the playbills often contain details of additional performances. a rectangle should be drawn around each. Any notes about upcoming or past performances can be ignored.

transcribe_actors.description: Transcribe actors and roles in historic playbills

tasks.question: Transcribe the name of the actor
tasks.guidance: Transcribe the name of the highlighted actor (and role, if present).
